error.message: Call to deprecated method substr() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use mb_substr() instead.

Call to deprecated function ip2country_get_country(). Deprecated in ip2country:8.x-1.9 and is removed from ip2country:8.x-2.0. Use the ip2country.lookup service instead. For example, \Drupal::service('ip2country.lookup')->getCountry($ip_address).

Call to deprecated function ip2country_get_country(). Deprecated in ip2country:8.x-1.9 and is removed from ip2country:8.x-2.0. Use the ip2country.lookup service instead. For example, \Drupal::service('ip2country.lookup')->getCountry($ip_address).
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to ip_language_negotiation.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
